title: Review: In ‘Take Me Out,’ Whose Team Are You On?
description: Richard Greenberg’s 2002 play about baseball and homophobia gets a fine revival starring Jesse Williams and Jesse Tyler Ferguson.
dc:creator: Jesse Green
media:description: Jesse Williams, foreground center, with from left: Tyler Lansing Weaks, Carl Lundstedt, Hiram Delgado, Patrick J. Adams and Eduardo Ramos in “Take Me Out” at the Helen Hayes Theater.
